name: Texture Transition Shader
description:
Controls:
Press space to transition
Click the buttons on the left to change the transition

This was a shader I created that allows you to transition between 2 different textures or colors smoothly. you can give it a greyscale image that will be used to calculate the transition between shaders.

You can see more information about this here: http://www.elliotchester.co.uk/p/texture-transition-shader.html
